p.e:
ALLEYS THROUGHOUT THE TOWN
OF RAVENSWICH DRAW THEIR
GATES AT NIGHT.  CURIOUS.

PERHAPS THE GATES TO THE
ISLAND'S WOODED AREAS TO
PREVENT WILDLIFE IN THE CITY.

BUT NO ONE ROAMS THE STREETS
IN THE EVENINGS ANYWAY, SO
THEN WHY THE CLOSURES INSIDE
THE TOWN?


AND WHY TONIGHT AM I HEARING
THE SICK LOUDLY COUGHING AND
HARD OF BREATHING WHEN JUST
TODAY THERE WAS NO MALADY?

--A.W.
